title: Posting of notices
context: [ยง398-1.5] Posting of notices. Every employer shall post and keep posted notices clearly setting forth the rights of employees provided by this chapter in a form prescribed by the director in conspicuous places in every establishment where any employee is employed so as to permit the employee to observe readily a copy on the way to or from the employee&rsquo;s place of employment. [L 2009, c 48, ยง1]
